apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this kiss emoji features two individuals with medium and medium-light skin tones leaning in for a tender embrace, their faces softened with Apple's signature rounded edges. The subtle blush on their cheeks and the gentle curve of their heads convey a sense of romantic affection and intimacy. It's a beautifully rendered depiction of love and connection, embodying warmth and closeness through Apple's polished design.
